mapper.insert: insert into teacher_clazz(teacherNumber , clazzNumber , createTime , term) values( #{teacherNumber} , #{clazzNumber} ,now() , #{term})
mapper.select: SELECT a.teacherNumber, max(score) maxScore, min(score) minScore, AVG(score) avgScore, a.clazzNumber FROM teacher_clazz a JOIN student_clazz b ON a.clazzNumber = b.clazzNumber GROUP BY teacherNumber, clazzNumber
mapper.delete: delete from teacher_clazz where teacherNumber = #{teacherNumber} and clazzNumber = #{clazzNumber}
